column1: 04.05.2017 that a decision had been taken to create and impose a reservation
extending 50m outwards from the high flood level contour line of the Uyanwatta
lake and therefore it was compulsory to reserve the said 50m area extending
from the surface of the said lake. Therefore, the Petitioners are seeking for a
mandate in the nature of a writ of certiorari for calling and quashing the said
purported decision (if any) made by the 1st to 11th Respondents imposing the
aforesaid 50m reservation, a mandate in the nature of a writ of Certiorari calling
